AI Description: amduprof is a tool developed for profiling OpenCL applications on AMD GPUs. It provides insights into the performance of OpenCL kernels by analyzing memory access patterns, kernel occupancy, and compute unit utilization.
Core Features: Profiling Opencl Applications, Analyzing Memory Access Patterns, Identifying Kernel Occupancy, Monitoring Compute Unit Utilization
General Tags: Gpu Profiling, Opencl Profiler, Performance Analysis
